title: after bumping to 3.0.0.CR2  > Could not find io.quarkus:quarkus-logging-sentry:.
body:
### Could not find io.quarkus:quarkus-logging-sentry:.



after bumping to 3.0.0.CR2 the not found error occures. the package does not seem to be deprecated or anything and its new to me, so it might correlate with CR2.

thanks

```

> Task :scheduler:quarkusGenerateCode FAILED

FAILURE: Build failed with an exception.

* What went wrong:
Execution failed for task ':scheduler:quarkusGenerateCode'.
> Could not resolve all files for configuration ':scheduler:quarkusProdBaseRuntimeClasspathConfiguration'.
   > Could not find io.quarkus:quarkus-logging-sentry:.
     Required by:
         project :scheduler

* Try:
> Run with --stacktrace option to get the stack trace.
> Run with --info or --debug option to get more log output.
> Run with --scan to get full insights.

* Get more help at https://help.gradle.org

```
